name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in crafting robust backend systems. Proficient in **Go**, **Ruby**, **Kotlin**, and **Swift**, with extensive use of **AWS** for cloud solutions. Skilled in **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, and experienced in **PostgreSQL** for database management. Proven ability to implement **Domain-Driven Design**, ensuring high code quality through effective **Testing** and **Code Reviews**. Renowned for problem-solving abilities and fostering team collaboration, contributing to successful projects in top-tier environments, including financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines. Strong background in creating scalable services and high-performing APIs with a focus on automation.
